MAY TIMESHEETSOnly submit your timesheet if you have exceptional time ie sick personal vacation etc or if your rotation information has changed Sorry we are no longer tracking overtime since you are salary based To all AA Pool members It is important to inform us if you have exceptional ie vacation sick holiday time To those members who are submitting time to your assistant please make sure the assistant forwards this information on to the AA program With the RollOut of SAP you have the ability to go online and input your time I will continue to email for timesheets regardless if you go online This memo is to inform you to complete your timesheet Quick Reminder You may receive your present paychecks EB if delivery is not setup to your locationmail stop NEW LOCATION NOTICE TO RECEIVE PAYCHECKS AS OF JUNE EBC Thank You for Your Cooperation Constance Charles Sr HR Assistant Associate Analyst Program Ext

RE Analyst Associate Program Timesheets October Hello Vladi Sorry you are experiencing problems entering your time Please call me and I would be pleased to walk you through the process on EHRonline Thanks Constance Charles Human Resources x Original Message From Pimenov Vladi Sent Tuesday October PM To Charles Constance Subject RE Analyst Associate Program Timesheets October Sensitivity Confidential Constance I was on vacation from October th to October th and I didnt submit my timesheet yet I tried to do it on the HRonline website but the procedure is too complicated Is it possible that you or somebody else in the HR department mark the vacation time I would really appreciate that Thank you Vladi Pimenov ext Original Message From Charles Constance Sent Friday October PM Subject Analyst Associate Program Timesheets October Importance High Sensitivity Confidential The Deadline to Submit Your Timesheet is Noon Its That Time Again Please enter your time This memo is a reminder to log onto eHRonline and complete your timesheet Remember you only need to submit your time if you have exceptional time ie vacation sick holiday etc or if your rotation information has changed Enron does not track overtime for Analysts and Associates Thank you for your cooperation Constance Charles Analyst Associate Program Human Resources Quick Reminder You may receive your present or previous paychecks EB A

REVISED DATE FOR SUPER SATURDAY DINNER TEAM ITINERARY Cc Team Itinerary Date Friday October Restaurant La Columbe dOr Montrose Cocktails PM Dinner PM PM Table No If you have any questions please contact Julie Braly Thank you for your participation in this important recruiting event Pleas e bring your business cards Executive Host Hector Gutierrez AssociateAnalyst Cohost Masha Arefieva Ben Rogers Dinner Details All Super Saturday candidates will be arriving at the restaurant by shuttle A member of the Associate and Analyst Program staff will greet them This staff member will also be there to assist you All hosts and cohosts are invited to ride the shuttle or you may provide your own transportation to t he restaurant There will be a short cocktail reception prior to dinner During the reception you will have the opportunity to meet many of the candidates A table has been reserved in the Executive Hosts name Students will not have seating assignments this year The hosts should feel free to invite up to four students to sit at their table if desired Dress for the evening is business attire Hosts are no longer responsible for the bill In case of emergency contact Julie Braly Director Career Development Associate Analyst Program Office Cell Phon e If you would like to provide feedback on any candidate an evaluation form is attached or you may discuss your input with the Associate and Analyst staff member after dinner The evaluation form must be faxed to pri or to pm on Saturday to be included in the decision meeting Candidates Attending NAMESCHOOL Dawn ArmfieldMichigan Jeffrey FoutzMichigan Nitin MantriMichigan Pedro PorfirioMichigan Luis RiveroMichigan Stephen TillackMichigan Carlos WatanabeMichigan Kengo WatanabeMichigan Seshadri RaghavanMichigan RICE MBA INFO SESSION REMINDER FINAL DAY RSVPFINAL DAY TO REGISTER RICE MBA INFO SESSION PLEASE RSVP BY NOON NOVEMBER THANKS Come learn about the Jones Graduate School of Management at Rice University This is your opportunity to meet to meet with individuals from the Jones Office of Admissions as well as with current students and alumni Date Monday November Time pm Location ECN c Space is limited so please email Constance Charles by November st to RSVP Thanks and hope to see you there

RICE MBA INFO SESSION APPLICATIONSBROCHURES Cc Good Afternoon Analysts Were you unable to attend the Rice MBA Info Session Or would you like more information Please visit EBA for brochures applications and other information regarding the Monday November Rice MBA Info Session Date Monday November Time pm Location ECN c If we may offer any additional assistance please do not hesitate to contact us x Thanks Constance Charles Human Resources Analyst Associate Program

The Deadline to Submit Your Timesheet is Monday Noon Its That Time Again Please enter your time This memo is a reminder to log onto eHRonline and complete your timesheet Remember you only need to submit your time if you have exceptional time ie vacation sick holiday etc or if your rotation information has changed Enron does not track overtime for Analysts and Associates Thank you for your cooperation Constance Charles Associate Analyst Program Human Resources Quick Reminder You may receive your present or previous paychecks EB A If you would prefer to receive your paycheck at your mailstop please email the mailstop information to Gwendolyn Gray Remember to send your MAILSTOP not office location

MAY TIMESHEETPST The Deadline to Submit Your Timesheet is Noon Only submit your timesheet if you have exceptional time or if your rotation information has changed Sorry we are no longer tracking overtime since you are salary based To all AA Pool members It is important to inform us if you have exceptional time To those members who are submitting time to your assistant please make sure the assistant forwards this information to the AA program With the RollOut of SAP you have the ability to go online and input your time I will continue to email for timesheets regardless if you go online This memo is to inform you to complete your timesheet Quick Reminder You may receive your present or previous paychecks EB if delivery is not setup to your locationmail stop Thank You for Your Cooperation Constance Charles Assistant to Terry Bosien Associate Analyst Program Ext

MAY TIMESHEETSOnly submit your timesheet if you have exceptional time ie sick personal vacation etc or if your rotation information has changed Sorry we are no longer tracking overtime since you are salary based To all AA Pool members It is important to inform us if you have exceptional ie vacation sick holiday time To those members who are submitting time to your assistant please make sure the assistant forwards this information on to the AA program With the RollOut of SAP you have the ability to go online and input your time I will continue to email for timesheets regardless if you go online This memo is to inform you to complete your timesheet Quick Reminder You may receive your present paychecks EB if delivery is not setup to your locationmail stop NEW LOCATION NOTICE TO RECEIVE PAYCHECKS AS OF JUNE EBC Thank You for Your Cooperation Constance Charles Sr HR Assistant Associate Analyst Program Ext

unaware there were Susan Scotts If you have any questions or need any additional information please do no t hesitate to contact me x Thanks Constance Forwarded by Constance CharlesHRCorpEnron on AM Constance Charles PM To Lisa ES Susan ScottET NRON cc Julie NRON Subject SUPER SATURDAY DINNER ITINERARY TABLE If you have any questions please contact Julie Braly Dinner Team Itinerary Date Friday November Restaurant Clives Louisiana Cocktails PM Dinner PM PM Table No Thank you for your participation in this important recruiting event Pleas e bring your business cards Executive Host Lisa Polk AssociateAnalyst Cohost Susan Scott Dinner Details Thank you for your participation in this important recruiting event All Super Saturday candidates will be arriving at the restaurant by shuttle A member of the Associate and Analyst Program staff will greet them This staff member will also be there to assist you All hosts and cohosts are invited to ride the shuttle or you may provide your own transportation to t he restaurant There will be a short cocktail reception prior to dinner During the reception you will have the opportunity to meet many of the candidates A table has been reserved in the Executive Hosts name Students will not have seating assignments this year The hosts should feel free to invite up to four students to sit at their table if desired Dress for the evening is business attire Hosts are no longer responsible for the bill In case of emergency contact Julie Braly Director Career Development Associate Analyst Program Office Cell Phone If you would like to provide feedback on any candidate an evaluation form is attached or you may discuss your input with the Associate and Analyst staff member after dinner The evaluation form must be faxed to prior to pm on Saturday to be included in the decision meeting Candidates Attending Baylor Oklahoma Rice Texas AM University of Florida University of Texas

APRIL TIMESHEETSOnly submit your timesheet if you have exceptional time or if your rotation information has changed Sorry we are no longer tracking overtime since you are salary based To all AA Pool members It is important to inform us if you have exceptional time To those members who are submitting time to your assistant please make sure the assistant forwards this information on to the AA program With the RollOut of SAP you have the ability to go online and input your time I will continue to email for timesheets regardless if you go online This memo is to inform you to complete your timesheet Quick Reminder You may receive your present or previous paychecks EB if delivery is not setup to your locationmail stop Thank You for Your Cooperation Constance Charles Sr HR Assistant Associate Analyst Program Ext
